member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory
member.summary: Produces instances of that can read data encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) from a stream or buffer and map it to an XML Infoset and instances of that can map an XML Infoset to JSON and write JSON-encoded data to a stream.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonReader(System.Byte[],System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas)
member.summary: Creates an that can map buffers encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) to an XML Infoset.
member.param: The input buffer array from which to read.
The used to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data.
member.returns: An that can process JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) data.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonReader(System.IO.Stream,System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas)
member.summary: Creates an that can map streams encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) to an XML Infoset.
member.param: The input from which to read.
The used to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data.
member.returns: An that can read JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonReader(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas)
member.summary: Creates an that can map buffers encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON), of a specified size and offset, to an XML Infoset.
member.param: The input buffer array from which to read.
Starting position from which to read in buffer.
Number of bytes that can be read from buffer.
The used to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data.
member.returns: An that can read JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonReader(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas,System.Xml.OnXmlDictionaryReaderClose)
member.summary: Creates an that can map streams encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON), of a specified size and offset, to an XML Infoset.
member.param: The input from which to read.
The that specifies the character encoding used by the reader. If is specified as the value, the reader attempts to auto-detect the encoding.
The used to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data.
The delegate to call when the reader is closed.
member.returns: An that can read JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonReader(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding,System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas,System.Xml.OnXmlDictionaryReaderClose)
member.summary: Creates an that can map buffers encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON), with a specified size and offset and character encoding, to an XML Infoset.
member.param: The input buffer array from which to read.
Starting position from which to read in buffer.
Number of bytes that can be read from buffer.
The that specifies the character encoding used by the reader. If is specified as the value, the reader attempts to auto-detect the encoding.
The used to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data.
The delegate to call when the reader is closed. The default value is .
member.returns: An that can read JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonWriter(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates an that writes data encoded with JSON to a stream.
member.param: The output for the JSON writer.
member.returns: An that writes data encoded with JSON to the stream based on an XML Infoset.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonWriter(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Creates an that writes data encoded with JSON to a stream with a specified character encoding.
member.param: The output for the JSON writer.
The that specifies the character encoding used by the writer. The default encoding is UTF-8.
member.returns: An that writes data encoded with JSON to the stream based on an XML Infoset.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonWriter(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an that writes data encoded with JSON to a stream with a specified character encoding.
member.param: The output for the JSON writer.
The that specifies the character encoding used by the writer. The default encoding is UTF-8.
If , the output stream is closed by the writer when done; otherwise . The default value is .
member.returns: An that writes data encoded with JSON to the stream based on an XML Infoset.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonWriter(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an that writes data encoded with JSON to a stream with a specified character.
member.param: The output for the JSON writer.
The that specifies the character encoding used by the writer. The default encoding is UTF-8.
If , the output stream is closed by the writer when done; otherwise . The default value is .
If , the output uses multiline format, indenting each level properly; otherwise, .
member.returns: An that writes data encoded with JSON to the stream based on an XML Infoset.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonWriter(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an that writes data encoded with JSON to a stream with a specified character.
member.param: The output for the JSON writer.
The that specifies the character encoding used by the writer. The default encoding is UTF-8.
If , the output stream is closed by the writer when done; otherwise . The default value is .
If , the output uses multiline format, indenting each level properly; otherwise, .
The string used to indent each level.
member.returns: An that writes data encoded with JSON to the stream based on an XML Infoset.

to apply.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer
